meanings.definition: A person or thing that stirs.
meanings.sent1: The chef used the stirrers to mix the ingredients in the pot.
meanings.sent2: I always lose my favorite stirrers in the kitchen drawer.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat became the stirrers in the peaceful household.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as the stirrers, causing a commotion in the room.
meanings.sent5: The stirrers in the story were the ones who brought about change.

meanings.sent1: She grabbed the wooden stirrers to blend the hot chocolate.
meanings.sent2: The metal stirrers clinked against the glass as she mixed the drink.
meanings.sent3: The tiny stirrers danced around in the cup, making it look alive.
meanings.sent4: The stirrers in her hand felt like magic wands, transforming the mixture.
meanings.sent5: The colorful stirrers added a playful touch to the cocktail party.

meanings.sent1: The automatic stirrers in the pot kept the soup from burning.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the speed of the electronic stirrers to get the perfect consistency.
meanings.sent3: The robotic stirrers malfunctioned and splattered sauce everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The futuristic stirrers hummed softly as they mixed the potion.
meanings.sent5: The high-tech stirrers revolutionized the way we cook.
